name: Karn Liberated
oracle_text: +4: Target player exiles a card from their hand.
−3: Exile target permanent.
−14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Apostle's Blessing
oracle_text: ({WP} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
Target artifact or creature you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Auriok Survivors
oracle_text: When Auriok Survivors enters the battlefield, you may return target Equipment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you do, you may attach it to Auriok Survivors.
flavor_text: "We are Mirrodin's children. We will reclaim her—one scrap at a time, if we have to."

name: Blade Splicer
oracle_text: When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control have first strike.

name: Cathedral Membrane
oracle_text: ({WP} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
Defender
When Cathedral Membrane dies during combat, it deals 6 damage to each creature it blocked this combat.

name: Chancellor of the Annex
oracle_text: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, when each opponent casts their first spell of the game, counter that spell unless that player pays {1}.
Flying
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter it unless that player pays {1}.

name: Dispatch
oracle_text: Tap target creature.
Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, exile that creature.
flavor_text: Venser wondered if it could still be called a teleportation spell if the destination is oblivion.

name: Due Respect
oracle_text: Permanents enter the battlefield tapped this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"A display of humility is required of those who still possess such frailties."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
oracle_text: Vigilance
Other creatures you control get +2/+2.
Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.
flavor_text: "The Gitaxians whisper among themselves of other worlds. If they exist, we must bring Phyrexia's magnificence to them."

name: Exclusion Ritual
oracle_text: Imprint — When Exclusion Ritual enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent.
Players can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.
flavor_text:
"Your desires have become our discretion."
—Izathel, priest of the Annex

name: Forced Worship
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
{2}{W}: Return Forced Worship to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Imprisonment teaches revenge. Hobbling teaches resignation.

name: Inquisitor Exarch
oracle_text: When Inquisitor Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one —
• You gain 2 life.
• Target opponent loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Skin is the prison of the blessed and the stronghold of the heretic."
—Argent Etchings, plate 64, passage 17

name: Lost Leonin
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: Mirrans were broken down and rebuilt, made to be loyal servants of the force they had fought.

name: Loxodon Convert
flavor_text: Just one drop of the glistening oil can eventually stain even a soul as stalwart as a loxodon's beyond redemption.

name: Marrow Shards
oracle_text: ({WP} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
Marrow Shards deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
flavor_text:
"We are a single entity. Dissenters must be sutured into the Orthodoxy."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Master Splicer
oracle_text: When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: With Phyrexia's victory at hand, each sect began perfecting its vision.

name: Norn's Annex
oracle_text: ({WP} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
Creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {WP} for each of those creatures.

name: Phyrexian Unlife
oracle_text: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
As long as you have 0 or less life, all damage is dealt to you as though its source had infect. (Damage is dealt to you in the form of poison counters.)

name: Porcelain Legionnaire
oracle_text: ({WP} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
First strike
flavor_text:
"My new design has lightweight plating specially cultivated from heretics' spare tissues."
—Izathel, priest of the Annex

name: Puresteel Paladin
oracle_text: Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
Metalcraft — Equipment you control have equip {0} as long as you control three or more artifacts.

name: Remember the Fallen
oracle_text: Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: When the Mirrans had fallen, Planeswalkers carried the burden of remembrance.

name: Sensor Splicer
oracle_text: When Sensor Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control have vigilance.

name: Shattered Angel
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may gain 3 life.
flavor_text: She preaches the blessings of the Machine Orthodoxy.

name: Shriek Raptor
oracle_text: Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"That's no glint hawk. The skies have changed for the worse."
—Ria Ivor, White Sun partisan

name: Suture Priest
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 1 life.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.

name: War Report
oracle_text: You gain life equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield plus the number of artifacts on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Underling Ethu's 263rd report read simply "Yes, my lord. Overwhelmingly, my lord." This marked the end of the Mirran-Phyrexian War.

name: Argent Mutation
oracle_text: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"My world is corrupted beyond cleansing. I must prevent this from happening to other worlds."
—Karn

name: Arm with Aether
oracle_text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand."
flavor_text: "Anything we can do to hurt the Phyrexian invaders is worth dying for."

name: Blighted Agent
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Blighted Agent can't be blocked.
flavor_text:
"Urabrask may suspect our surveillance, but he cannot stop it."
—Avaricta, Gitaxian sective

name: Chained Throatseeker
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Chained Throatseeker can't attack unless defending player is poisoned.

name: Chancellor of the Spires
oracle_text: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, each opponent puts the top seven cards of their library into their graveyard.
Flying
When Chancellor of the Spires enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost.

name: Corrupted Resolve
oracle_text: Counter target spell if its controller is poisoned.
flavor_text:
"Flesh is a sickness that infects Phyrexia."
—Avaricta, Gitaxian sective

name: Deceiver Exarch
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Deceiver Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Untap target permanent you control.
• Tap target permanent an opponent controls.

name: Defensive Stance
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/+1.
flavor_text:
"It isn't for fighting. It's for when the fighting's gone bad."
—Kara Vrist, Mirran resistance

name: Gitaxian Probe
oracle_text: ({UP} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Look at target player's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"My flesh holds no secrets, monster. The spirit of Mirrodin will fight on."

name: Impaler Shrike
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Impaler Shrike deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, draw three cards.
flavor_text:
"Interrogation is an unnecessary step for acquiring information."
—Politus, Gitaxian morphologist

name: Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
oracle_text: Flash
At the beginning of your end step, draw seven cards.
Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by seven.
flavor_text: "It is not a goal, but a process—the process of creating the perfect Phyrexia."

name: Mental Misstep
oracle_text: ({UP} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Counter target spell with converted mana cost 1.
flavor_text:
"Your first mistake was thinking I would let you live long enough to make a second."
—Sarnvax, Gitaxian sective

name: Mindculling
oracle_text: You draw two cards and target opponent discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"Why infiltrate their strongholds when what we seek resides in such a poorly guarded safe?"
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

name: Numbing Dose
oracle_text: Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller, that player loses 1 life.

oracle_text: Imprint — When Phyrexian Ingester enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature.
Phyrexian Ingester gets +X/+Y, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.

oracle_text: ({UP} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

name: Psychic Barrier
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"I tolerate Phyrexians because the dragon requires it. But I have no patience for uninvited guests."
—Tezzeret

name: Psychic Surgery
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent shuffles their library, you may look at the top two cards of that library. You may exile one of those cards. Then put the rest on top of that library in any order.

name: Spined Thopter
oracle_text: ({UP} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Flying
flavor_text:

Flying

Draw two cards, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

oracle_text: Target player draws three cards, loses 3 life, and gets three poison counters.

oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

oracle_text: Each noncreature, non-Equipment artifact is an Equipment with equip {X} and "Equipped creature gets +X/+0," where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.
